nodes.text: Star Wars Galaxy Magazine 2 is the second issue of Star Wars Galaxy Magazine. It was published by Topps in January 1995. The Deluxe Collectors' Edition of issue 2, exclusive to subscribers and comic stores, came polybagged with the The X-Files Ashcan comic book, a prototype Topps Star Wars MasterVisions card, and a Topps Finest chromium trading card. This issue also included a Millennium Falcon fold-out poster article.
